info.name: HikingAdventure
info.description:
Collection of all API requests for hikingadventures.ne/api. 
For api calls on single resources (i.e. /resorts/520) we do not support query parameters.
For api calls on collections (i.e. /resorts & /resorts/520/trails) we support the following query parameters:

  q - JSON formatted search query. For more info: https://flask-restless.readthedocs.io/en/stable/searchformat.html#query-format
  
  page - Positive Integer page number. Must be less than or equal to total_pages.
  
  results_per_page - Positive Integer. If greater than maximum number of results this will be ignored.
